rows.label: qev092303_MSG0001
rows.name: Right on time! Er, you ARE the real Hope, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yes. Thank you again for your help—
we have to put a stop to this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0003
rows.name:
Okay! So why don't you guys hide,
and I'll draw our fake out here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0004
rows.name: All right. But be careful. Don't take any risks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0005
rows.name:
Thank you so much for coming all this way.
I know you're busy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0006
rows.name:
Aw, heck. You're always helping me
with one thing or another. I don't mind at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0007
rows.name:
That's very kind of you.
I'm afraid I just didn't know who else to ask...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0008
rows.name:
It's so unusual to hear you ask for help.
You've got me super curious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh, but uh...one thing first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0010
rows.name: Yes? What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0011
rows.name: You ARE the real Hope, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0012
rows.name: The...real Hope? I don't understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0013
rows.name:
No, I just heard this rumor about an impostor.
Can't be too careful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0014
rows.name:
No, trust me—I'm Hope from New LA.
What a strange rumor to invent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0015
rows.name: So you can prove that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0016
rows.name:
I've been together with Ornella this entire time.
She can vouch for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0017
rows.name:
Of course this is Hope!
What kind of bizarro questions are you asking, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0018
rows.name: Heh. Okay, okay. Guess I went a little nuts there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0019
rows.name: Thing is, I've got somebody that I'd like you guys to meet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0020
rows.name: ...You can come out now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0021
rows.name: What? This isn't possible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0022
rows.name: Ornella! You set me up?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0023
rows.name: No! I was just... Why are you even HERE, Hope?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0024
rows.name: I would ask you the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0025
rows.name: Are you a fake Ornella, just like I have a fake Hope?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0026
rows.name: I'm not... Ah, dammit! This whole plan has gone to hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_JNK0010
rows.name: Rage

rows.label: qev092303_SEL0011
rows.name: Angrily accuse Ornella of being a traitor.

rows.label: qev092303_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092303_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ornella what drove her to this.

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0027
rows.name: You think YOU'RE mad? Look at all the effort I wasted![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0028
rows.name: Damn you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0028_2
rows.name: Hope was the perfect tool—sweet and innocent and STUPID![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0029
rows.name: Money! Lots and lots and LOTS of money![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0030
rows.name:
I want to roll around in piles of credits and forget
all about the fact that I'm stuck on this stupid rock![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0031
rows.name: And I'd found the perfect little pawn in our dear Hope...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0032
rows.name:
YOU did this! You put ideas in her head!
You ruined everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0033
rows.name: No... No. This isn't really her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0034
rows.name:
Ornella helped me. She was always there.
She was like a mother to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0035
rows.name: You really are a stupid girl.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0036
rows.name:
Your precious Ornella is scum. She sold the lives
and bodies of her people for spending money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0037
rows.name: Guess there's no reason to hide anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0038
rows.name: We'll just kill you and add your parts to the latest shipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0039
rows.name:
You can rest easy knowing that I, the great Jisanne,
will be taking over the role of Hope Alanzi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0040
rows.name:
That sweet face of yours will add more fresh bodies
to my mother's collection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092303_MSG0041
rows.name: Now prepare to die for your kindness![ST:wait ]
